channel.title: Chatbox effects and colours?
channel.description: two things: the first being my server does not have any effects such as red: wave: etc how can i add them?? second the @red@ @cya@ etc commands to make the chatbox coloured this is a lower priority but would still be nice, How can i get both of these working??

item.title: Chatbox effects and colours?
item.dc:creator: @arcuza arcuza
item.description:
@arcuza wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:2, topic:429805”][quote author=arcuza link=topic=532484.msg3891986#msg3891986 date=1326940357]
two things:
the first being my server does not have any effects such as red: wave: etc how can i add them??
second the @red@ @cya@ etc commands to make the chatbox coloured this is a lower priority but would still be nice,
How can i get both of these working??
[/quote]
Wrong section, try CLIENT Help instead of SERVER Help, seeing as how everything you just said was CLIENT related and not SERVER related[/quote]
will do cheers

Read full topic
